title: Nacional Recipe
full_text:
Nacional Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
white rum
3/4
ounce
apricot brandy
(
Rothman & Winter Orchard Apricot
is a good choice)
1
ounce
fresh lime juice
3/4
ounce
simple syrup
(or less, to taste)
2
good dashes
of
Fee Brothers Peach Bitters
Directions
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well for 10 seconds and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Rum
Lime
